rules_text:
Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Undercover [i](You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. If it would die, exile it face down without revealing it instead. You may cast it face up while it’s exiled this way.)[/i]
